author: Anonymous Calc
title: Edx enrollment problem
question:
Here, I have a enrolment problem. When I tried to enroll edX through the given link from the SetUp, it keeps repeat this message, "There was an error loading this course". How should I resolve this problem ?
Thanks in advance !
student_answer:
From the email I've got:

Following the instructions on the setup page. Please note that you will not be able to enroll in the edX course until 11:59 PM PST on Sunday, January 9th.
